Birdman or ( The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance ) (2014) 9/10 This one is the kind of movie I want to be able to do someday. It's not everyone's type of movie, but with the right audience, it's perfect. A funny satire with depth and ambiguous endings. See it of that's your type.
